Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hepatitis B Virus Core Protein (147-175), HBc147-175

UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification of a novel antimicrobial peptide from human hepatitis B virus core protein arginine-rich domain (ARD).
Literature.Author: Chen HL, Su PY, Chang YS, Wu SY, Liao YD, Yu HM, Lauderdale TL, Chang K, Shih C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=1.84µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=3.68µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13884(MBC=3.68µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=3.68µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 19636(MBC=>117.86µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=>117.86µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=>117.86µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MBC=36.7µg/ml)
